metadata.dcterms:title: Diamond Inclusion Database
metadata.dcterms:creator: Stachel, Thomas
metadata.dcterms:description: Database of major element compositions of mineral inclusions in diamond, combined with physical, IR-spectroscopic and stable isotopic characteristics of their host diamonds
